full_text:
Brian George Hayward  is a retired Canadian professional ice hockey goaltender who currently serves as a color analyst for Anaheim Ducks broadcasts on Prime Ticket/Fox Sports West and KDOC.
^ Brian George Hayward http://www.legendsofhockey.net/LegendsOfHockey/jsp/SearchPlayer.jsp?player=18283#.USe7qFeQm2U
title: Brian Hayward
